questions_and_notes: Why is this variable needed given that gpp-tavg-z0-hxy-lus (gppLut-Emon) can be requested?  If this is only of interest to understanding the atmospheric budget it should include "over all_area_types".  Root can be simplified by leaving off the suffix and just define as "gpp" since the area type is indicated in suffix.
cell_methods: area: time: mean where shrubs (comment: mask=shrubFrac)
long_name: Gross Primary Production on Shrub Tiles as Carbon Mass Flux [kgC m-2 s-1]
comment: Total GPP of shrubs in the grid cell
